name: Add a new to row to Google Sheets from a new to-do in Habitica
description:
Every time a new to-do is created in Habitica, a new row will be added to Google Sheets. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18laiIv3Duiqo1CHt5alWHKhE0qXCLoGnA6BM8FBYRMI/edit#gid=0) Google Sheets spreadsheet - you can make a copy of it.
